text: Karjala is Finnish brand of beer. Sortavalan Panimo made the beer from 1932 to 1944. In 1948, it started to be made again. It is most popular in Finland. == Products == * Karjala I (2,7%) * Karjala III (4,6 %) * Karjala IVA (Export) (5,2 %) * Karjala IVB (8,0 %) * Karjala Terva (4,6%) == Other websites == * Hartwall's official webcite Category:Finnish beers
title: Karjala
